====Definitions====
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|interrogative pronoun asking for the specification of an identity, quantity, quality, etc. of something}} [[what]]; [[which]]
#: {{zh-x|何處|[[where]] [lit. '''what''' place]}}
#: {{zh-x|何日|what day; when}}
#* {{zh-x|王 曰：“何 謂 朝 雲？”|The king said, "'''What''' is this so-called 'Morning Clouds'?"|CL|ref={{lang|zh|宋玉《高唐賦》}}}}
# {{lb|zh|interrogative pronoun asking for reason, manner, etc. of an action}} [[why]]; [[how]]
#: {{zh-x|何必|'''why''' must you}}
#: {{zh-x|何不|'''why''' not}}
#* {{zh-x|亦 何 憂 令名 不 彰 邪？|'''Why''' do you worry about being not famous?|CL|ref={{lang|zh|劉義慶《世說新語·自新》}}}}
# {{†}} {{lb|zh|forming emphatic sentences}} [[so]]; [[such]]; [[what]]; [[how]]
#* {{zh-x|秦皇 掃 六 合，虎視 何 雄 哉。|Qin Shi Huang conquered the six kingdoms with a sweeping victory. '''How''' great he is when he unified the world and looked down upon it.|CL|ref={{lang|zh|李白《古風》}}}}
# {{surname|lang=zh}}
